name: Boxes (Analog Limb)
description:
My submission for Weekly GameJam 120 "What a Mess"

A short mystery game about a woman trying to reconnect with her estranged mother after her funeral. 

Controls:
- WASD to move
- Space to advance dialogue
- E to interact with highlighted objects

Tools used:
Unity, Game Creator (Dialogue and Inventory Module), Adobe Fuse (Characters), Mixamo (Animations)

Sound fx from Freesound: 
slanesh, slanesh, mario1298, ericssoundschmiede, gtsorbo, www-bonson-ca, daenerys, omar-alvarado, klankbeeld, inspectorj

Drone music is me playing around in SynthOne app
